head.title: CheerpJ 3 Saxon HE Java 11.6 XML Workbench: XSLT 3.0, XQuery 3.1, XPath 3.1

ul.li: XSLT 3.0 against XML or JSON input or no input starting with xsl:template name="xsl:initial-template", implemented using a call to the XPath 3.1 fn:transform function, allowing to capture result documents
XQuery 3.1 against XML or JSON input or no input
XPath 3.1 against XML or JSON input or no input
